ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pgrpsubgsymgbi.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) |
| 2 |  | pgrpsubgsymgbi.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_issubg | |- ( P e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_bitri | |- ( P e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_symggrp | |- ( A e. V -> G e. Grp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ibar | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_bicomd | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) <-> ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. V -> ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) <-> ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( A e. V -> ( P e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
